summary: Mobius Nova Energy landing page with static enlarged logo, following unified brand guidelines
architectural_notes: Primary font: Montserrat (Bold for headings, Regular for body)
Color palette: Liquid Silver (#C0C0C0), Nova Gold (#FFD700), Deep Space Black (#0D0D0D), Cosmic Blue (#1E90FF), Solar White (#FFFFFF)
Tagline: 'Lighting the way to the future and beyond' - centered under logo
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Technology page hero image showcasing multi-modal energy system (technology-hero.dim_1200x600.png)
- About page background image with energy innovation theme (about-background.dim_1200x800.png)
- Contact page header image with communication theme (contact-header.dim_1200x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a landing page that uses the provided Mobius Nova Energy logo image (1000008424.jpg) as the hero logo, prominently displaying the infinity symbol with dog, rose stem, and branding text 'LIGHTING THE WAY TO THE FUTURE AND BEYOND'

Design the landing page with a sophisticated, premium aesthetic that complements the metallic silver and warm gold tones of the Mobius Nova Energy logo, using a dark background theme consistent with the logo's presentation
Add hero section content below or around the logo that introduces Mobius Nova Energy with a compelling tagline and brief description
Include additional landing page sections such as features, benefits, or call-to-action areas that support the energy/innovation theme
Increase the size of the Mobius Nova Energy logo in the hero section to make it more prominent on the landing page
Add a liquid flowing ripple animation effect to the Möbius loop portion of the logo, creating a dynamic visual representation of liquid silver movement

Update the landing page color palette to use the official MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors: Liquid Silver (#C0C0C0), Nova Gold (#FFD700), Deep Space Black (#0D0D0D), Cosmic Blue (#1E90FF), and Solar White (#FFFFFF)
Implement Montserrat as the primary font family throughout the landing page with Bold weight for headings and Regular weight for body text, with Arial and Helvetica as backup fonts
Format all branding text with MOBIUS-NOVA in full caps and ensure the tagline 'Lighting the way to the future and beyond' is displayed in sentence case centered under the logo
Apply the brand guideline typography sizing recommendations: use 18-24pt for headings and 11-12pt for body text, with all-caps formatting for headings throughout the landing page

Add a lighting effect to the Möbius loop portion of the logo (1000008424.jpg) that makes the loop appear brighter as the animation progresses along the path of the infinity symbol, creating a traveling light effect that moves through the loop
Remove the liquid ripple animation effect from the Möbius loop portion of the logo in the hero section
Remove the traveling light effect that makes the Möbius loop appear brighter as it progresses along the infinity symbol path
Display the MOBIUS-NOVA logo (1000008424.jpg) as a static image in the hero section without any animation effects

Remove the existing placeholder section from the landing page that contains 'Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first', 'Target output: 4.5–8.0 kW validated by engineering analysis', 'Veteran-founded, designed from the ground up for distributed deployment', and 'Seeking first pilot installation partners'

Add a new section highlighting the founder's Navy ET (Electronics Technician) background with the messaging 'designed by someone who actually understands the electrical systems, not just the business case'
Add messaging about veteran-founded and service-connected status that resonates with off-grid, rural, and preparedness-minded customers
Add content highlighting the multi-modal single core technology as a unique differentiator, emphasizing that most competitors offer wind-only or hydro-only solutions
Remove the content from the seven selected elements in section[5] that currently display founder Navy ET background, veteran-founded messaging, and multi-modal technology differentiation
Replace the removed content in the selected section[5] elements with two new messages: 'Seeking first pilot installation partners' and 'Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first'
Remove the newsletter signup bar displaying 'Join our newsletter for energy insights and exclusive offers' from the landing page
Remove the statistics section displaying '10K+ Installations Worldwide', '99.9% System Uptime', and '50M+ kWh Generated' from the CallToActionSection component

Create dedicated page components for each navigation link currently in the Footer component (About, Technology, Features, Contact) that maintain the same visual styling as the landing page, including MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors (Liquid Silver, Nova Gold, Deep Space Black, Cosmic Blue, Solar White), Montserrat font family, dark gradient backgrounds, and consistent spacing/layout patterns

Implement client-side routing using React Router to enable navigation between the landing page and the newly created pages (About, Technology, Features, Contact), updating the Footer navigation links to use proper routing instead of href anchors

Display the user-provided image renders on the appropriate pages among the newly created About, Technology, Features, and Contact pages, rendering them as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Create landing page with user-provided image
Enlarge the logo on the landing page
Remove placeholder content section and replace with specified accurate information about Navy ET background, veteran-founded status, and multi-modal single core technology
Remove Navy ET and veteran messaging sections and replace with 'Seeking first pilot installation partners' and 'Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first'
Remove newsletter signup bar and statistics section (installations/uptime/kWh)
Create additional pages for navigation links with consistent styling
Integrate additional image renders into new pages
